Name: Fairy Glade
About the game: Taking a walk in the woods has never been a problem before, but this time will lead Daphne into an alternate realm of existence. The fairy glade, but can she find her way back out again and if she does what adventures will she have along the way, your choices will determine her path and what may come. A visual novel set in the fairy realm filled with demons, fairies and other creatures with multiple choices to make. An LGBTQ+ game with a female protagonist.
